thread.title: Kylie Minogue unlucky in love again after dumping toyboy lover Joshua Sasse for getting too close to No Tomorrow actress Marta Milans
thread.title_full: Kylie Minogue unlucky in love again after dumping toyboy lover Joshua Sasse for getting too close to No Tomorrow actress Marta Milans

author: oloveridgegreene
title: Kylie Minogue unlucky in love again after dumping toyboy lover Joshua Sasse for getting too close to No Tomorrow actress Marta Milans
text:
TV Magazine KYLIE BINS 'CHEATING' fiancé Kylie Minogue unlucky in love again after dumping toyboy lover Joshua Sasse for getting too close to No Tomorrow actress Marta Milans 
The devastated singer calls off engagement over suspicions actor fiancé cheated on her with glam Spaniard Marta Milans Exclusive BY DAN WOOTTON, BIZARRE EDITOR 2nd February 2017, 11:55 pm Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments KYLIE Minogue has ditched fiancé Joshua Sasse over suspicions he has cheated on her, The Sun can reveal. 
The devastated star, 48, has broken off her engagement to the British actor, 29, and thrown him out of her West London home. Getty Images - WireImage Kylie Minogue has called off her engagement to toyboy lover Joshua Sasse Splash News Pain . . . anguished Kylie appears to cry at hotel in Sydney Splash News Pent-up . . . star gets wound up during meeting with pal 
A source said: “She no longer trusts him.” 
Furious Kylie ordered toyboy fiancé Joshua out of her home after growing suspicious about his relationship with an actress. 
Kylie, 48, believed Joshua, 29, had kept secret his increasing closeness to glamorous Spaniard Marta ­Milans , 34, insiders have revealed. Getty Images - WireImage Joshua is believed to have become close to 34-year-old Spaniard Marta Milans Alamy 24 Kylie poses without her engagement ring last week 
The Can’t Get You Out of My Head singer suspected the British actor of cheating on her and has now removed her “beloved” engagement ring. 
Pals say she is inconsolable at the split — days after she vowed to drop her Minogue surname and become Kylie Sasse when they married. 
Our source revealed: “She is absolutely devastated, totally heartbroken. Getty Images - WireImage Pals say devastated Kylie thought Joshua was ‘the one’ Alamy Joshua is said to have bonded with Maria while on set for US drama No Tomorrow Rex Features The Spanish actress is said to have been growing close with Joshua for months 
“She really believed he was The One. But she no longer trusts him.” 
Joshua is said to have bonded with Marta while filming US TV drama No Tomorrow last year in Vancouver, Canada. 
A source who worked on the show, which has since been axed, revealed: “It is well known that Joshua and Marta had been close for a number of months.” 
Kylie is said to have had a series of rows with Joshua before travelling to Paris Fashion Week two weeks ago with her best pal, photographer Katerina Jebb. Kylie Minogue kisses her boyfriend in new video BLITZ PICTURES 24 Until recently Kylie was always seen to have worn her engagement ring 
When she returned, the Aussie superstar — who has had several famous lovers — asked Joshua to leave her West London home. 
He has now moved back to his family’s farm house in Leominster, ­Herefordshire. 
Our source explained: “It was in Paris that Kylie became suspicious and returned to London to confront Joshua. 
“She immediately asked him to leave her home, which he had moved into at the start of the relationship.” 
On Saturday Kylie was seen for the first time without her engagement ring — a huge Art Deco-inspired sparkler. PA:Press Association 24 Joshua has now moved back to his family house in Herefordshire after Kylie gave him the boot 
Posting a pic on Instagram from the recording studio, she obscured her ring finger by drawing hearts across the picture. 
But songwriter Grace Barker, who is working on Kylie’s album, also posted a photo which showed her without the ring she has worn continuously for a year. 
Friends say they have harboured doubts for some time about the relationship, which had been “tempestuous from the start”. 
Kylie, who beat breast cancer in 2005, has been pictured looking drawn in recent months — appearing to cry at a Sydney hotel with a friend in November. Record Company Friends said the superstar's relationship seemed stormy from the offset matrixpictures.co.uk A source said the relationship has 'never been smooth sailing' PA:Press Association 24 The couple met in 2015 and became engaged soon after 
The source said: “After getting engaged she should have been on top of the world but it’s never been smooth sailing. 
“Everyone is so upset for Kylie but her close friends and family really want her to get through this and stay strong.” 
The couple met on the set of US TV show Galavant in summer 2015. 
They quickly became an item and got engaged just months later when he proposed on holiday. Getty Images The couple had previously vowed not to wed until same-sex marriage was legal in Australia Getty Images Kylie also announced she would drop Minogue and take Joshua's surname RELATED STORIES Meet Marta Milans, the Spanish actress and friend of Kylie Minogue's former fiancé Joshua Sasse What kind of fool? Get the low-down on Joshua Sasse, actor and Kylie Minogue’s former fiancé ‘IT’S A GREAT SADNESS’ Dannii Minogue reveals sister Kylie's despair at not having children in emotional chat I SHOULD BE SO LICKY Kylie Minogue stuns Scottish sweet shop staff when she nips in for two bags of goodies NIGHT FEVER Kylie Minogue, 48, shows off her amazing figure as she roller skates to the Bee Gees in skintight catsuit KYLIE EMOTIONAL Kylie Minogue fights back the tears as she goes make-up free during heated discussion with a female pal CAN'T GET IT OUT OF MY HEAD Why ARE Lady Gaga and Kylie Minogue's hits more likely to stick in your mind? 
After The Sun broke the news, they officially announced their engagement in February 2016. 
The couple had vowed not to wed until same-sex marriage was made legal in Australia . 
But they have both been highly vocal about their happiness together. 
Joshua gushed last August: “I know I’m in love when I don’t want to be anywhere else but with her.” 
He added: “As anyone who has met her will attest, she is just the most unbelievable bundle of joy. 
“It’s magic, it’s excitement and joy and sex. Splash News Sources close to Kylie revealed things between the couple had been breaking down for some time Getty Images 24 Both Kylie and Joshua refused to comment 
“It’s feeling like you are alive with someone else and for me, it’s someone else who really makes me feel like I am alive every day.” 
Announcing her plans to take Joshua’s surname when they tied the knot , the singer said last month: “Kylie Sasse is a great name. 
"Kylie Minogue has never exactly tripped off the tongue.” 
Last night a source close to Kylie revealed things had been breaking down for some time. 
They said: “It is over but Kylie has been the bigger person here - she wouldn’t sling someone out on the street. But he did leave. 
“The reality is this situation had been bubbling under for a little while. She tried to make it work.” 
Kylie’s spokesman declined to comment. 
Joshua also refused. Gushing about Joshua 
The Aussie star has spent the past couple of years waxing lyrical about her now-ex beau. 
Here are some of her most smitten quotes: 
“I go all gooey at the mention of him!” she told the Daily Telegraph in Australia in November 2015. Planet Photos Kylie snuggling up to Joshua 
She also said of household chores: “I don’t do the cooking. Joshua does the cooking.” 
On public displays of affection, she admitted: “I love that. I do all of it.” 
And on their 20-year age difference, she insisted: “Even though on paper it might not look right, it just is right. He is an absolutely brilliant, brilliant guy.” 
She went on: “Even if I try and act cool and natural, it’s written all over my face that I am very happy. 
“Can I confess we actually did get matching jumpers? I’m not kidding.” 
The following month she told Desert Island Discs: “I have a love in my life, which is just a beautiful thing.” 
Last month, Kylie again spoke of the age gap, telling You magazine: “It’s not an issue, trust me.” Her significant others 
Kylie has had a series of high-profile romances since shooting to fame. 
She dated Neighbours co-star Jason Donovan before splitting in 1989. 
Kylie then hooked up with INXS rock star Michael Hutchence at the age of 21. Rex Features 1988 . . . Kylie Minogue and Jason Donovan Dave Bennett 1989 . . . Kylie Minogue and Michael Hutchence London Features International 2003 . . . Kylie Minogue and Oliver Martinez Fame Flynet 2012 . . . Kylie Minogue and Andres Velencoso 
Her next known relationship was with model James Gooding, 41. This ended in 2003. 
Kylie seemed besotted with French film star Olivier Martinez, 50, but their romance broke down in 2007 after four years together. 
Her most recent boyfriend prior to Josh was Spanish model Andres Velencoso, 37.
